testcase.name: Verify that a valid user can sign in
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user goes to the webpage................................................passed When user enters standard_user and secret_sauce.............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the shop page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that a in-valid users cannot sign in
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user goes to the webpage................................................passed When user enters locked_out_user and secret_sauce...........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is not able to enter to the shop page.............................passed

testcase.name: Verify that a in-valid users cannot sign in 2
Buy the maximun and the minimum price item of the store
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user goes to the webpage................................................passed When user enters standard_user and secret_sauce.............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user select the max and min price item.................................passed And clicks on the shopping cart.............................................passed Then click on checkout......................................................passed Then enters Pedro Probador 101101...........................................passed And click on continue.......................................................passed Then See the summary and click on finish....................................passed And the order is complete...................................................passed
